line.originaltext: 2 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped
line.annotation: create_ing(ing16, "2 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped")

line.originaltext: 2/3 cup fresh or frozen blueberries
line.annotation: create_ing(ing17, "2/3 cup fresh or frozen blueberries")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon heat-stable granular sugar substitute
line.annotation: create_ing(ing18, "1 tablespoon heat-stable granular sugar substitute")

line.originaltext: 1/2 teaspoon apple pie spice or ground allspice
line.annotation: create_ing(ing19, "1/2 teaspoon apple pie spice or ground allspice")

line.originaltext: 1 1/3 cups whole wheat pastry flour
line.annotation: create_ing(ing20, "1 1/3 cups whole wheat pastry flour")

line.originaltext: 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt
line.annotation: create_ing(ing21, "1/4 teaspoon kosher salt")

line.originaltext: 1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil
line.annotation: create_ing(ing22, "1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil")

line.originaltext: 3 tablespoons low-fat milk
line.annotation: create_ing(ing23, "3 tablespoons low-fat milk")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl combine apples, blueberries, sugar substitute, and the 1/4 teaspoon apple pie spice; set aside.
line.annotation: create_tool(t3, "medium bowl ")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl combine apples, blueberries, sugar substitute, and the 1/4 teaspoon apple pie spice; set aside.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing17, ing18, ing19}, ing24, "fruit, sugar, and allspice", "")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl combine apples, blueberries, sugar substitute, and the 1/4 teaspoon apple pie spice; set aside.
line.annotation: put(ing24, t3)

line.originaltext: In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice.
line.annotation: create_tool(t4, "another medium bowl")

line.originaltext: In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice.
line.annotation: create_ing(ing25, "1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice")

line.originaltext: In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing21, ing25}, ing26, "flour mixture", "")

line.originaltext: In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice.
line.annotation: mix(ing26, t4, ing27, "stirred flour mixture", "stir together")

line.originaltext: Add oil and milk all at once to flour mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing22, ing23, ing27}, ing28, "wet flour mixture", "add oil and milk all at once")

line.originaltext: Stir lightly with a fork until dough comes together.
line.annotation: mix(ing28, , ing29, "dough", "stir lightly with fork until dough comes together")

line.originaltext: Divide dough into 6 portions.
line.annotation: cut(ing29, ing30, "6 portions of dough", "divide")

line.originaltext: Using six 3 1/2- to 4-inch individual tart pans with removable bottoms, press one dough portion on the bottom and up the side of each tart pan.
line.annotation: create_tool(t5, "six 1/2- to 4-inch tart pans with removable bottoms")

line.originaltext: Using six 3 1/2- to 4-inch individual tart pans with removable bottoms, press one dough portion on the bottom and up the side of each tart pan.
line.annotation: do(ing30, t5, ing31, "pastry-lined pans", "press one dough portion on the bottom and up the side of each tart pan")

line.originaltext: Divide fruit mixture among pastry-lined pans.
line.annotation: combine({ing24, ing31}, ing32, "unbaked fruit tarts", "divide fruit mixture among pastry-lined pans")

line.originaltext: Place tart pans on a large baking sheet.
line.annotation: create_tool(t6, "large baking sheet")

line.originaltext: Place tart pans on a large baking sheet.
line.annotation: put(ing32, t5)

line.originaltext: Place a large piece of foil over tart pans; press down lightly around the edges to seal.
line.annotation: set(t5, "place large piece of foil over, press down lightly around the edges to seal")

line.originaltext: Bake in a 375 degrees F oven for 20 minutes; remove foil.
line.annotation: create_tool(t8, "oven")

line.originaltext: Bake in a 375 degrees F oven for 20 minutes; remove foil.
line.annotation: cook(ing32, t8, ing33, "half baked tarts", "bake at 375 degrees F for 20 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake in a 375 degrees F oven for 20 minutes; remove foil.
line.annotation: set(t5,"remove foil")

line.originaltext: Bake about 20 minutes more or until fruit is tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing33, t8, ing34, "hot tarts", "bake about 20 minutes more or until fruit is tender")

line.originaltext: Let cool in tart pans on a wire rack for 15 minutes.
line.annotation: leave(ing34,"let cool in tart pans on a wire rack for 15 minutes")

line.originaltext: Carefully remove sides of tart pans.
line.annotation: set(t5,"remove sides of tart pans")

line.originaltext: Serve warm or cool.
line.annotation: serve(ing34,"warm or cool")
